'''''rî''''' is a [[Sindarin]] word meaning "wreath, garland".<ref name=Shibb>{{PM|Shibboleth}}, p. 347</ref>

==Etymology==

The word is a descendant form of [[Primitive Quendian]] ''rīgā'', deriving from the [[Common Eldarin]] [[Sundocarme|stem]] [[RIG]] ("twine, wreathe").<ref name=Shibb/>

==Examples==
*''[[Galadriel#Etymology|Galad'''ri'''el]]''<ref name=Shibb/>

==Cognates==

*[[Quenya]]/[[Telerin]] ''[[ría]]''

==See also==
*[[Noldorin]] ''[[rhî]]'' ("crown")
*[[Quenya]] ''[[rië]]''
